name: Political Edge
membership: British Chamber of Commerce in Belgium
goal:
We help clients to identify and mitigate political risks to their business and reputation across European markets.

We work directly with CEOs and senior company executives to identify and mitigate political risks affecting their business and its reputation. We offer personalised solutions that take account of the political environment in which our clients operate, their business model and their reputation.

We offer two types of complementary services: first-class analysis of political risks and tailored public affairs solutions.
interests: Development, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: EU-UK Relations, Common Security and Foreign Policy, Enlargement, Neighbourhood policy, Trade.
